subject: New Book Arrivals
body: We are excited to announce the arrival of new books in our library. Come and explore the latest additions!

subject: Library Closure
body: Due to maintenance work, the library will be closed on May 25th. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

subject: Book Club Meeting
body: Join us for our monthly book club meeting on June 2nd. We will be discussing the book 'The Great Gatsby'.

subject: Library Card Expiry
body: Please be informed that your library card will expire on June 10th. Visit the circulation desk to renew your card.

subject: Library Workshops
body: We are organizing various workshops in the library, including writing skills, research methods, and citation styles. Check the schedule for more details.

subject: Library Survey
body: We value your feedback! Please take a few minutes to complete our library survey and let us know how we can improve our services.

subject: Extended Opening Hours
body: Starting from next month, the library will have extended opening hours on weekends. Enjoy more time for studying and reading!

subject: Book Return Reminder
body: Kindly remember to return any borrowed books on time to avoid late fees. Renewals can be done online or at the circulation desk.

subject: Library Events Calendar
body: Stay updated with our library events and activities by referring to the online events calendar on our website.

subject: New E-Resources Available
body: We have added a collection of new e-resources, including e-books, e-journals, and online databases. Access them through our library website.
